testcase.name: Genrate Outpayment without select checkbox
testcase.system-out: Given Go to ISTools.........................................................passed When Login IST with valid credentials.......................................passed Then Login Success..........................................................passed And Select Arrow Menu "Real Time Disbursement"..............................passed And Select Menu "Dashboard for BO In Payment"...............................passed And Select STATUS "Manual Disbursement".....................................passed And Click button "Search"...................................................passed And Verify Table Filled.....................................................passed And Click button "Generate Outpayment"......................................passed And Get text from pop up "Warning Message" with text "Warning : No data selected !".passed And Click button "OK".......................................................passed And Click button "Logout"...................................................passed And Close browser...........................................................passed

testcase.name: Genrate Outpayment and select checkbox first
testcase.system-out: Given Go to ISTools.........................................................passed When Login IST with valid credentials.......................................passed Then Login Success..........................................................passed And Select Arrow Menu "Real Time Disbursement"..............................passed And Select Menu "Dashboard for BO In Payment"...............................passed And Select STATUS "Manual Disbursement".....................................passed And Click button "Search"...................................................passed And Verify Table Filled.....................................................passed And Click Checkbox..........................................................passed And Click button "Generate Outpayment"......................................passed And Get text from pop up "Success Message" with text "Generate Outpayment File Success".passed And Click button "OK".......................................................passed And Click button "Logout"...................................................passed And Close browser...........................................................passed
